body.name: OMBAR Dash Cam Hardwire Kit, 11.5ft Type-C Hard Wire Kit Fuse for Dashcam, 12V-24V to 5V Car Dash Camera Charger Power Cord, Low Voltage Protection, Enable Parking Mode for DC100, M570/571/572
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 1 hr 12 mins
features: 【24/7 Parking Monitoring】OMBAR dash cam has a 24-Hours Parking Monitor feature - This feature is used with an hard wire kit, which provides continuous power to your dash cam when your car is parked.

【Low Voltage Protection】The inbuilt minimum voltage limiter will protect the vehicle's battery from going flat. If the voltage of your car battery drops to this default voltage 11.8V or 23.6V, it will cut off the power, which leaves you with enough power to start your car for the next time.

【Complete Accessories】Contains all the components required to easily piggyback on the fuse box. Simply plug the required fuse tap cable into the vehicle’s fuse box to provide the camera with its own power supply.

【Wide Compatibility】This mini usb cable hardwire kit is suitable for most car models(Voltage between 12-24V). OMBAR USB hardwire kit works for almost all car mini USB device, such as dash cam, mirror cam, GPS navigator and radar detector, etc

【Warranty & Support】The dash cam hardwire kit comes with a full 12 months warranty, if you have any question regarding your product, please do not hesitate to contact us via Amazon, after-sale service is 7/24 on standby.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I needed!!
reviews.reviewText: I bought the dash cam and I wanted to utilize the 24 hour parking mode so I bought the hardwire kit. It came perfectly packaged in a small little white box and contained everything you needed. I watched a YouTube video and It was fairly easy to hook up! My camera works great, the picture quality is amazing and I love the use of the app

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Buyer Beware - Ombar Products Don't Work - Manufacturer Ghosting me for Refund or Replacement.
reviews.reviewText: At Amazon’s Technical Support’s recommendation, I contacted Ombar Technical Support vi email about helping with the hardwire setup. I’ve done this with ease with other dashboard cams. Here is their response to me.“Hardware kit we sincerely hope that you could ask help from local professionalhad many customers happen issue when they install it by themself and solve it by professioanl help"Please make sure that the device is connected to the 3-Lead Hardware Kit." means that you don't install it correctly.That’s all I got. Amazon was more helpful.All of their product as been pulled. I have filed a formal complaint against Ombar with Amazon. See below communications with Ombar support...Email #1 Start:------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Ken H. - Jan 7, 2024, 2:17 PM (4 days ago)to supportHi Support,Both Amazon Tech Support and I need your help.I purchased your Ombar Dashboard Cam (front/rear) M572 and the recommended hardware kit. Everything works perfectly until we attempt to set up the parking and collision modes. The dashboard cam displays a message of "Please make sure that the device is connected to the 3-Lead Hardware Kit."I've checked all the connections to make sure they're secure. I've validated that the constant fuse relay is always active at the right amp level. Ground is grounded. The alternate connection is connected to the cig / usb connector. Even made sure I clamped down on the connectors. Doesn't seem to be a problem there.Car Information: 2015 Toyota Venza LX (constant on is fog light) (alternate is cog/usb connector).Neither Amazon Tech Support nor I could figure out how to factory reset the device.Please advise,Ken H.-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------support - Jan 7, 2024, 8:01 PM (4 days ago)to Ken H.Hi friendhardwire kit we sincerely hope that you could ask help from local professionalhad many customers happen issue when they install it by themself and solve it by professioanl help"Please make sure that the device is connected to the 3-Lead Hardware Kit." mean that you don't install it correctly.any questions pls feel free to contact ussupportsupport@ombars.com签名由 网易灵犀办公 定制---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Ken H. - Jan 7, 2024, 8:38 PM (4 days ago)to supportHello Support,Not quite the support response I was expecting and what I read on Amazon. I’ve installed similar kits for other dashboard cams and not had this issue.If it ends up being the hardware kit and/or device I will expect your company to provide a refund and payment for the correctionKen.------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------support - Jan 7, 2024, 8:52 PM (4 days ago)to Ken H.hi friend,we think device won't have any problem with our SD card. you can try to install it with our cigaratte lighter cable.we will provide a refund and payment for the correction if your problem solved at lastthankssupportsupport@ombars.com签名由 网易灵犀办公 定制--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Ken H. - Jan 7, 2024, 9:30 PM (4 days ago)to supportJust for clarification, the camera works. It’s recording etc. The only issue is the parking and collision modes. There are no other issues with the camera. SD card recording is working as expected.Regards-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------support - Jan 7, 2024, 9:45 PM (4 days ago)to Ken H.ok, wait for your feedback.if you need refund for the hardwire kit, just emial usthankssupportsupport@ombars.com签名由 网易灵犀办公 定制------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Ken H. - Jan 8, 2024, 8:07 PM (3 days ago)to supportHello Support,Feedback. I went to Car Toys to have them professionally troubleshoot the problem with the Hardwire Kit and the camera. The receipt and Tech write-up are attached.Results:1. I wired the Hardware Kit correctly (Ground, Battery, and Alternate)..2. Problem: The connectors in the Hardwire Kit were not soldered correctly. This caused the error of the 3-wire issue being displayed on the camera.3. The technician also believes there still could be a problem with the camera, it shuts off for no reason and/or freezes up for no reason. Before asking, he wants me to test it for a couple of days to confirm. I'll test for a week and provide feedback.I would like a refund for the Hardwire Kit as that was a problem. If possible, I would like a credit for the Car Toy charges I paid to validate a problem with the Hardwire Kit I need your assistance with correcting.Regards,Ken H.------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------support - Jan 8, 2024, 9:24 PM (3 days ago)to Ken H.Hi friendso many thanks for your patiencewe could provide total refund for the hardwire kit by Amazon, pls share your order number, we will arrange the refund asap when we get your information.thankssupportsupport@ombars.com签名由 网易灵犀办公 定制------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Ken H. - Jan 8, 2024, 9:45 PM (3 days ago)to supportThank you. How about the charge from Car Toy to diagnose the problem with the Hardwire Kit?RegardsKen--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Ken H. - Jan 8, 2024, 9:47 PM (3 days ago)to supportHere is the Amazon Order Number for the Hardwire Kit?114-1344616-#######Ken-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Ken H. - On Jan 8, 2024, at 21:45,to support﻿Thank you. How about the charge from Car Toy to diagnose the problem with the Hardwire Kit?-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------support - Jan 8, 2024, 9:58 PM (3 days ago)to Ken H.HiAfter checking, we could help to apply to cover your diagnose cost up to 40%, but need to be done tomorrow and will give you result about what percentage of the cost we can ultimately afford.any questions or suggestion pls feel free to contact usThankssupportsupport@ombars.com签名由 网易灵犀办公 定制------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Ken H. - Jan 8, 2024, 10:44 PM (3 days ago)to supportThanks but you are clear that the problem was with your product that advised me to take to a professional help me diagnose problem was your product?You see where I’m going with this? Normally, sellers cover all the cost, if it is determined the product was the cause. If it was a problem I caused, I wouldn’t go back to you and ask for you to cover 40% of the cost.True?--------------------------------------------------------------------------------Ken H. - Jan 10, 2024, 3:09 PM (1 day ago)to supportHello,Any response back to my request? I haven't seen any credit applied to my account on Amazon.------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Ken H. - Jan 10, 2024, 8:47 PM (19 hours ago)to supportHello Ombar Support,Can you answer my inquiry? I have not seen a response from you.------------------------------------------------------------------------Ken H. - 7:37 AM (8 hours ago)to supportHello Ombar Support,I'm reaching out one last time.....Regards,Ken H.

reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Never worked! Just get a different kit.
reviews.reviewText: I installed this correctly 3 times before I figured out the inline stepdown was fubared. Very frustrating only to find out a cheap piece of Chinese electronics selling for $29 on Amazon wouldn't work. Live and learn! I went with another kit and you should too.

reviews.reviewText: I do not recommend this at all. All the parts are poorly made. Cheap dollar store quality. I called customer service and they are no help. Took nearly 40 hours for them to respond and when they did, they are the worst company to deal with. No help at all.
